item.title: Atomic Habit Notes v2
item.description: Level 1 Reading, to me is the extraction of information. I will not process them yet. Basically this is the ground work to help me absorb the information. Chapter 1 Key Concepts What if you grow 1% compounded daily? Days Years Factor 365 1 37 730 2 1427 1095 3 53,939 1460 4 2,038,007 Quoting James Clear

item.title: Notes on Permission Marketing
item.description: After a quick reading of “Permission Marketing” by Seth Godin, I think I have a better idea of how I should approach content creation. Thinking back, I should already have known this from Business School. Fundamentally, Content Creation is a form of marketing. The first form of Content Creators that comes to mind would be YouTubers. And when you see YouTubers breakdown their income, it typically contains the following components:
